AreaPage.chooseDatasetDescription: Choose a dataset to explore data for this area
AreaPage.noDatasetsDescription: There are currently no datasets available for this area. Check back later or contact us if you need specific data types.
AreaPage.comingSoonDescription: You'll be able to explore and create datasets for this area directly from this page.

NavSearch.typeMoreChars: Type {count} more character{count, plural, one {} other {s}} to search
NavSearch.searchHint: Try searching for cities, regions, or countries

AreaSelector.searchPlaceholder: Please enter at least 3 characters to search
AreaSelector.searchDescription: Only administrative areas (cities, towns, neighborhoods) will be shown in results
AreaSelector.noAreasFound: No areas found. Try a different search term.

CreateDatasetWizard.selectAreaDescription: Type an area name and select from the suggestions. This can be a city, town, neighborhood, or any administrative area in OpenStreetMap.
CreateDatasetWizard.selectTemplateDescription: Choose a data template that defines what OpenStreetMap features to dataset.
CreateDatasetWizard.testQueryDescription: Test the selected template query against your chosen area to see what data will be monitored.
CreateDatasetWizard.confirmDescription: Review your selections and create your dataset.

CreateDatasetPage.createDescription: Follow the steps below to create a new dataset for tracking OpenStreetMap data.

QueryTester.selectAreaTemplateFirst: Please select an area and template first.
QueryTester.noResultsDescription: The query returned no results. This could mean:
QueryTester.noFeaturesMatch: No features match the criteria in this area
QueryTester.areaNoAmenities: The area might not have the specified amenities

PreferencesPage.reportsDescription: Receive email updates when your followed datasets have changes.

DatasetMap.fullScreenMapLabel: Full screen interactive map showing dataset
DatasetMap.noDataAvailable: No data available. Data will be automatically refreshed when you visit this page.
DatasetMap.noGeographicData: No geographic data found in the dataset results.
DatasetMap.noDataInTimeframe: No data found in the selected time period

PublicDatasetsFeed.title: Public City Data Datasets
PublicDatasetsFeed.subtitle: Discover what datasets others are monitoring across different cities

hero.title: Understand your city through open data
hero.description: OSM for Cities organizes OpenStreetMap data into datasets you can follow. Track schools, transport, parks, and clinics as they change, receive updates by email, and understand how your city evolves over time.

features.subtitle: Features
features.title: How OSM for Cities works
features.description: Follow datasets, track changes, explore data visually, and download for analysis

curate.title: Select your datasets
curate.description: Choose what matters to your city. Follow schools, transit, parks, clinics, or any dataset tracked in OpenStreetMap. Organize the infrastructure you care about.

notifications.title: Get notified of changes
notifications.description: Receive email alerts when datasets you follow are updated. Stay informed about new facilities, infrastructure changes, and urban development as OpenStreetMap contributors edit the map.

inspect.title: Inspect data on a map
inspect.description: Explore datasets visually on an interactive map. Click on individual features to see detailed information, compare historical data, and understand spatial relationships in your city.

download.title: Download data for analysis
download.description: Export datasets as GeoJSON for use in external tools, research projects, or custom analysis. All data is available under the Open Database License (ODbL).

useCases.subtitle: Use cases
useCases.title: Maps serve many purposes
useCases.description: The same dataset tells different stories depending on who reads it and what they need to know.

urbanPlanners.title: Monitor infrastructure changes
urbanPlanners.description: Follow schools, transit, healthcare, and other services across districts to understand coverage gaps and development patterns.

journalists.title: Track urban development stories
journalists.description: Monitor facility openings and closures, identify disparities across neighborhoods, and verify claims with current data.

researchers.title: Study urban change patterns
researchers.description: Access reliable data to analyze how services evolve over time and compare accessibility between different areas.

developers.title: Build with reliable data
developers.description: Access consistent, up-to-date urban datasets for applications, analysis tools, and community mapping projects.

communityGroups.title: Monitor local services
communityGroups.description: Track essential facilities and services in your area to identify gaps and advocate for community needs.

publicInstitutions.title: Share service locations
publicInstitutions.description: Provide transparent access to current facility locations and maintain awareness of available services.

residents.title: Stay informed locally
residents.description: Follow neighborhood changes and receive updates when new services open or existing ones relocate in your area.

businesses.title: Monitor location accuracy
businesses.description: Track how business locations appear in mapping data and ensure customers can find current services nearby.

showcase.subtitle: Categories
showcase.title: Explore dataset categories
showcase.description: Browse different types of urban infrastructure tracked in OpenStreetMap

healthcare.title: Medical facilities & services
healthcare.description: Hospitals, clinics, pharmacies, and other healthcare facilities that provide essential medical services to communities.

transportation.title: Transport infrastructure
transportation.description: Bus stops, bike rentals, charging stations, and other facilities that keep cities moving and connected.

education.title: Learning institutions
education.description: Schools, universities, libraries, and kindergartens that provide educational opportunities across all age groups.

leisure.title: Sports facilities & activities
leisure.description: Sports venues, recreational areas, and facilities that promote active lifestyles and community engagement.

environment.title: Natural & environmental features
environment.description: Waterfalls, dams, tailings ponds, and other environmental features that impact local ecosystems.

amenities.title: Essential public facilities
amenities.description: Public toilets, drinking water, and community facilities that support daily urban life for residents and visitors.

tourism.title: Hospitality & attractions
tourism.description: Hotels, guest houses, and tourist attractions that welcome visitors and showcase local culture.

culture.title: Cultural venues & landmarks
culture.description: Cinemas, monuments, galleries, and heritage sites that preserve and showcase local culture and history.

social.title: Community & social facilities
social.description: Social facilities, community centers, and services that support vulnerable populations and community welfare.

signup.title: Get started
signup.description: Create an account to follow datasets and receive email updates when data changes.

DatasetLoading.thisUsuallyTakesLessThan30Seconds: This usually takes less than 30 seconds

DatasetErrors.templateNotFoundDescription: The dataset template "{templateId}" doesn't exist or is no longer available.
DatasetErrors.templateNotFoundForArea: We couldn't find this dataset type for {areaName}.
DatasetErrors.areaNotFoundDescription: The area with ID "{areaId}" doesn't exist in OpenStreetMap or couldn't be found. Please check the area ID and try again.
DatasetErrors.timeoutDescription: The request to create this dataset took too long. This usually happens with very large areas or during peak usage times.
DatasetErrors.tooLargeDescription: This area contains too much data for the selected template. Try choosing a smaller area or a more specific template.
DatasetErrors.creationErrorDescription: We encountered an error while creating the dataset
DatasetErrors.creationErrorDescriptionWithDetails: We encountered an error while creating the dataset "{templateName}" for {areaName}.
DatasetErrors.suggestionSmallerArea: Try a smaller city or district instead of a large region
DatasetErrors.suggestionSpecificTemplate: Use a more specific template (e.g., "Primary Schools" instead of "All Schools")
DatasetErrors.suggestionContactUs: Contact us if you need data for large areas
DatasetErrors.unexpectedErrorDescription: We encountered an unexpected error while loading the dataset. Please try again.
